title: Astro-Mano
overview: Pedro and Astro-Mano are separated by a galaxy. Pedro leads a monotonous and meaningless life and Astro-Mano lives on a planet where his value is not recognized. Pedro is fired from his job and Astro Mano, by accident, crashes to Earth. Their meeting gives rise to an unlikely friendship that will change both their lives. Astro-Mano wants to help Pedro find meaning in his life and Pedro wants to help him return home, but there is someone who will do everything to prevent this from happening. And only the two of them, together, can defeat him. A journey sharing two worlds where the adventures that await them will make them discover their own value. Life is a journey, join us.
